name: Celebrities Who Were Born in 1961 Quiz | Celebrities | 25 Questions

questions.text: This actress, who played in an ensemble cast portraying the lives of rich teenagers, was actually 29 when the show premiered. She later hosted her own talk show, from 1995 to 1996.
